DESCRIPTION :

When in the vast metropolis wielded powerful criminal group, the usual methods of combating crime is not valid. The rank and file police officers, special agents and force the FBI - no one can stand in the way of powerful Mafiosi and substitute a blow for his family and friends. The only way to gather evidence - send a spy in the heart of the gang. This is the last chance before the city finally mired in a wave of crime. And it will become the savior of you. Gas in the floor, 120 km / h on the counter, and more! The most expensive and exclusive cars, frenzied excitement of the race - if you want to become a "home among strangers," plunge into this life with his head! Even the police did not know about the secret operation, and "cops" will haunt you as the real culprit. And in this pursuit will have to sweat in order to survive, because the course is everything from shooting at the wheels and ending challenge helicopters. But do not let fear grab your mind until the last beat, do everything for the main task - to calculate the mysterious leader of a criminal syndicate. Who's it going, if not you?

"Life on the edge. Welcome to the reach of ordinary citizens the world of illegal racing, incredible speed and big money. At first you're there stranger, but trust can be earned. Risks press on the gas pedal and master in a hostile environment. Treachery and chases, screeching brakes and claps shots - you go through all the circles of criminal-gonochogo hell!
"Feel like a target. Secrecy - above all, so that even the police did not know about your job and chases you, both notorious villains. Get ready to experience all the "charms" chase from barrage of spikes and warning shots before smashing a battering ram.
"Megapolis waiting. Three huge city, connected by miles of magnificent highway, would be the scene for the chase, illegal racing and a whole spy story.
"Best of schedule. Surrounded by the city lights, sparkling chrome wheels sports cars, hundreds of kilometers of roads and expressways - it looks like live action. You do not just feel in the role of the special agent in the most dangerous job.
"Hunter and the victim. In an exciting collective races you can become what you want - and the offender, and the police. Scoot, run the file, tangle traces or, conversely, pursue to the end and punish the offender by law.
